Description:
MODERN APARTMENT IN THE HEART OF CLAYTON!
This is a unique opportunity for the investor, first home buyer or downsizer looking to buy the ideal apartment in a prominent location of Clayton.
This modern double storey two bedroom apartment offering central tiled bathroom with toilet, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances, living area adjoining with balcony, secure underground parking, air-conditioning and intercom security entrance.
Right opposite the Clayton Community Centre including a library, theatrette, pre-school, occasional care, youth and family services, maternal and child care services, café, gymnasium, meeting rooms, an indoor aquatic facility and MonashLink community health services, and walking distance to Clayton shopping precinct and Clayton train station, also short distance to Monash University, Chadstone Shopping Centre and access to Dandenong Road and Monash Freeway.

Description:
SOLD IN 2 DAYS!
Renovated, well positioned and ready to move into and enjoy, this rear unit is all about the low maintenance lifestyle.
At the back of just 4, its classic picket front fence and cream brick facade conceal a thoroughly modern interior with light paint tones and polished hardwood floors throughout.
Features include a generous lounge with electric heater and a separate renovated kitchen with upright oven/stove and an included meals area.
There are 2 bedrooms with built in wardrobes and a stylish bathroom tiled in porcelain and featuring a frameless shower and included laundry facilities.
Outside you find a compact courtyard and the bonus of a tandem carport that could double as a covered entertaining area.
A great position completes the package with Westall train station within walking distance and easily accessible local shops including central Clayton in minutes.
Insights: 4/3 Browning Avenue, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 48 other 2 bedroom unit in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
Fully Renovated Family Home In Prime Location (Approx 600m2 land)
Set in one of Clayton South's most sought after locations, within walking distance to Namatjira Park, buses, local primary schools, and minutes away from Clarinda Shopping Centre Clayton Central, Clayton train station and Monash University.
This beautifully renovated family home boasts generous size living area, modern kitchen, four large bedrooms (two with WIRs), central bathroom with spa and outdoor alfresco. As you walk in, the flowing floor plan will lead you to a spacious formal lounge with polish hardwood floorboards throughout, and a lovely dining area adjoining to north facing modern kitchen, packed with stone benchtops, glass splashbacks, 900mm Smeg gas cooktop & oven, Miele dishwasher, aluminium bi-fold windows overlooking outdoor undercover alfresco entertaining area.
Premium extras include polished timber floorboards throughout, downlights, gas ducted heating, split system air conditioning, built-in surround sound system, 5KW solar panels, commercial 2 glass door integrated under bar fridge and height adjustable charcoal BBQ and spit, lock up garage, shed and a massive backyard also allows the children to run around and enjoy.
Inspect now!

Description:
AUCTION THIS SATURDAY AT 11.00AM
This beautiful family home has been totally renovated and there is nothing to do except move in, sit back, relax and enjoy the luxury of life.
As you enter you cannot help but notice the rendered facade and the new 15 m long double driveway that lead to a high pitch ceiling single garage that can be accessed using remote control. The garage is set up with quality fixed cabinets, bar fridge and serving benchtop with open space to outdoor area. Through another roller door you can access backyard. The functional garage can be used for storage and perfect to park car, caravan, boat... And even for birthday parties!
The fully renovated 3 bedrooms house with quality modern furnishings including a master bedroom has a full ensuite. Bonnaire ducted gas heating and ducted evaporative cooling. There is a ceiling fan in the large L shape lounge area with down lights.
Bathrooms are fully renovated to give that modern feel. The frameless shower screens are huge and tiled to the ceilings with wall mounted toilet seats and stylish free- standing bathtub. The toilets use grey water from the massive water tank.
As you enter the main residence, you see the corridor is tiled. All the other rooms are covered with timber flooring.
The kitchen has been upgraded with bay window to serve outdoor living. The open plan kitchen with dining area has an astonishing 70mm marble benchtop and a gas cook top along with natural timber cabinets.
Laundry room located next to kitchen is separate with fancy flower pictured glass splashback and plenty storage.
The back yard is built for entertainment purposes. It has 2 massive alfresco areas. Surrounded by exotic landscape and garden trees that are easy to maintain with under-cover entertaining area and built in new covered BBQ area.
In addition there are two garden sheds with large 2000L water tank connected to both toilets and garden tap to keep the garden lush and the lawn green.
Situated in a sought after location of Clayton South, this renovated home is a rare offer indeed. Clarinda Shopping Centre, Library, schools, medical centres and transport are within a short walking distance.
Come and inspect and you won't be disappointed.
ID Required

Description:
Whisper Quiet in Renovated Style
Slip into something comfortable in this stylishly renovated 3 bedroom street front home. Sparkling inside with polished boards and northern sun, this easy care retreat features 3 double bedrooms (BIRs), a glass sliding door to a north facing living & dining room, gorgeous stone kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a subtle green glass splashback; fresh crisp bathroom, separate toilet and laundry.
Completely private and secure, the rear courtyard garden features an alfresco area and landscaped gardens for all to enjoy and admire. With nothing to do, this idyllic haven provides ducted heating, R/C air conditioning, timber blinds, a water tank, a shed, an auto garage plus 2nd car space on a shared drive.
One of only two in this tucked away court, around the corner from Namatjira Park, buses and kindergartens, walk to friendly Clarinda Shopping Centre, the cosmopolitan Clayton Road shops, schools and the train.

Description:
Make A Winning Start In A Winning Location
Offering a winning start, this delightful single level 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home is loaded with potential for first home buyers, young families or investors to obtain a foothold in the market place. Immaculately presented throughout, add your own contemporary flair to inviting spaces or enjoy as is. An inviting interior offers timber floors, pristine modern kitchen that flows into a spacious living/meals area and ducted heating/AC. The impressive outdoor dimensions including a child-friendly rear garden, SLUG/storage and ample off street parking enhance present day appeal, complemented by a fabulous location just minutes to Keeley Reserve, bus routes, Clayton station and shopping precinct, schools and Monash Medical Centre.
*Please Note* Buxton Real Estate may refuse to provide further information about the property should you prefer not to disclose your Full Contact Details including Phone Number. Photo id required upon entering the property.

Heaven in Bevan, Stamp Duty Savings in a Growth Area !!!!
Located in one of South Eastern Suburbs fastest growing pockets (based on land per square metre sale) is this beautiful and contemporary modern residence development.
Boasting all the modern inclusions and with a thoughtful, practical living floorplan, you will find your own slice of Heaven at 49 Bevan.
With all the convenience of Clayton Central and Springvale Central just minutes away, it will be hard to find another location that offers so much and for such great value.
ABOUT THE LOCATION:

Description:
When only the best will do!
Under Contract - Open Cancelled
Imagine a spacious new luxury 2-bedroom townhouse that is as big as a 3-bedroom; then add to that a garage and two living areas with study nook and you are well on your way to owning this spectacular property.
Whether you are an investor, retiree or 1st home buyer, you will appreciate the high quality construction, fit and finish. From the driveway to your front door and within the home, it shows an eye for detail.
Designed to bring natural light in to drench the interior. Upstairs there are 2 large bedrooms both with BIR's and a large bathroom in between for convenience and privacy, a study nook or retreat and separately along the hall is a storage linen closet.
The kitchen features strong lines and high-quality stone benches and the combined casual dining room, living room and kitchen space makes up the largest room in the house making the kitchen truly the heart of this home which remains cosy and warm in winter with the ducted AC heating and cool all summer long!
A lock up garage for the car with internal access to the home finishes off this neat package situated in a family-friendly community with Westall Secondary College and Primary just around the corner, Keeley Park, The Grange Reserve and Spring Valley Golf Club close by, walking distance to Station and the Princess Highway is only minutes away!
Master Builders Association, multiple award winning company Costa Constructions were the builders of this project.
It ticks all the boxes! Register your interest today.
DETAILS
• 2 Bedrooms both with BIR's
• Large open plan Kitchen / meals / living area
• Ducted heating and cooling
• Remote controlled Lock up garage with internal access
• Walking distance to the train station, local shops and both Primary and secondary colleges
• Low maintenance back yard
• Only minutes to the Princess Highway
Call Multisell today to arrange your inspection.
All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Powerful Potential Of A Prime Corner - With The Option To Buy Next Door!
Impressive options with endless advantages, this significant corner allotment of 674m2 (approx) invites a huge array of opportunity. Currently occupied by a 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home, it features living/meals area, kitchen and split system heating/AC. To the rear, oversized gates allow access to a large reinforced concrete yard, with carport, workshop and sheds connected with heavy duty power, ideal for trucks, boats or caravans. Capitalise on the priceless combination of dual frontages and the potential to purchase the next door allotment (2 Charlotte Street) of 670m2 (approx), for a total of 1,344m2 (approx), presenting a unique opportunity for a multiple townhouse development (STCA). Situated for convenience close to Keeley Reserve, bus routes, train station, schools, Clayton shops and Monash Medical Centre.

Description:
AN IMMACULATE & ORIGINAL 1 OWNER HOME
In impressive condition thanks to the always caring owners who have been here its entire life, this home offers plenty for a young family, investors or someone looking to add their own touches to a home.
Set on around 532sqm with an 18 metre frontage (approx) and zoned GRZ3, the home is largely original meaning there is nothing to hide and its true condition is simply beautiful.
You may choose to leave it as is and simply rent it out, update it to add value or explore its potential for redevelopment (STCA).
Behind its impressive gardens and classic brick facade you find a generous lounge room that is complemented by a family/meals area and neat kitchen with all gas appliances.
There are four bedrooms including two with built in wardrobes, the master has a walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite to match the family bathroom and second toilet.
Ducted heating and evaporative cooling come as welcome extras and outside you find a broad covered patio, an oversized double garage with kitchenette and a north facing yard set up as a big vegie patch with water tank.
Right near the beautiful Namatjira Park and wetlands, buses and central Clayton, a great package completes a very impressive package, in this premium pocket of Clayton South.
Insights: 17 Lanark Street, Clayton South VIC 3169 was last sold in 2016 and 27 other 4 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

This beautifully presented three bedroom home is in a block of 3 unit, within walking distance to the Train Station and only minutes away to central Clayton, Monash University and Monash Medical Centre.
Comprise 3 good size bedrooms, with built-in robes, spacious lounge, central bathroom, fully equipped modern kitchen, overlooking family meals, polished timber floors, gas heating, low maintenance courtyard, instantaneous hot water system.

Description:
Perfectly Proportioned Deluxe Living
Sure to appeal to a wide range of buyers, this sensational townhouse is a genuine rarity. Tastefully designed, it comprises of three bedrooms and two bathrooms. Downstairs enjoys a generous lounge and open plan kitchen meals area that is bathed in light, and opens up to an entertainer's paradise with a fully decked and low maintenance rear yard. The property features fixtures and finishes of the highest quality and with such close proximity to Westall Train Station, Westall Secondary College, public transport, parklands and much more, whether you are looking to invest or just starting out, this is your golden opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
ATTENTION FIRST HOME BUYERS
This lovely bright and well sized fully renovated unit represents an opportunity to secure an investment that's ready to move into immediately!
Not to mention the location – close to Clayton Central Shops and train station, and even closer to Westall Train station and shops.
Featuring - Floating timber floors, a bright and airy generous lounge with a split system heater/air conditioner and a separate renovated kitchen with included meals area.
There are 2 large bedrooms with built in wardrobes, a beautiful bathroom tiled from floor to ceiling in porcelain plus a separate toilet and full laundry.
Outside you find a single garage and a grass free courtyard that is private and easily maintained.
Thanks for your time!

Description:
Best Location In Clayton South, with Massive 906m2 land Approx
Land size: 19.81m x 45.72m = 906sqm approx.
Situated in one of Clayton South's finest streets is this perfect opportunity to develop this fantastic block, perfect for a builder/developer/investor looking to develop multiple double storey townhouses(STCA).
Existing 3 bedroom weatherboard home appealing to both investor and the developer is within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, local schools, parklands, Clayton Central Shopping District, Clayton Community Centre, and only minutes away from Monash Medical Centre and Monash University.
Get your architect ready to design fantastic multiple double storey townhouses (subject to council approval), in order to capture this beautiful opportunity, inspect now!

Description:
NEW, TOP QUALITY & RIGHT NEAR CENTRAL CLAYTON
Designed and built with quality at its forefront, this brand new street front townhouse offers room for a growing family in a great location just a few hundred metres from all of central Clayton's facilities including shops and train station. Styled to meet the demands of a busy modern lifestyle, the home boasts a vast living/dining area with floating floors and a gorgeous kitchen with stone benches, glass splashbacks and stainless steel appliances. There are 3 robed bedrooms upstairs including the master with an ensuite tiled in porcelain from floor to ceiling that matches the family bathroom and additional downstairs powder room. A host of extras provide additional comfort and value including split system heater/air conditioners, LED lighting and double glazed windows throughout while outside you find a double remote garage with internal access and a private landscaped courtyard. All within easy walk to Clayton shops and transport.
Insights: 63 other 3 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.

Description:
EXECUTIVE LIVING AT ITS FINEST, CLOSE TO CENTRAL CLAYTON
Boasting stunning design, unrivaled quality and features, this executive style townhouse is also located within an easy walk of central Clayton's shops, cafes and train station. With low maintenance living on many occupiers and investors shopping list, this meets the brief perfectly with features including a living/dining room incorporating the stone and stainless equipped kitchen and there's also another living area upstairs or open study area. There are 2 robed bedrooms upstairs, a bathroom tiled in porcelain from floor to ceiling and a total of 3 toilets. There's a range of extras that add to its appeal including split system heater/air conditioner, LED lighting and double glazed windows while outside you find a remote garage with internal access and private landscaped courtyard.
Insights: 9 other 2 bedroom house in Clayton South have recently been sold.
